overview: Danny is cute, 18 years old, and a college virgin. Muscle boy Max is 24, worldly wise, and hung. With nothing to do for the summer holidays, they set off to find the horniest boys and the hottest sex throughout Europe. And these boys find plenty!  Their quest takes them to Paris, France, on to Mont Blanc in Switzerland, and then through Germany, where they meet the Army! Exhausted, Danny and Max take a train to Munich in Germany but they fall asleep and miss their stop. The end of the line is in a different world...and Danny's sex life will never be the same again!
title: DreamBoy
